name: Flickr Digest
author: Kapeel Sable

sections.description:
This plugin will digest your Flickr photos uploaded in last X days
in a single post periodically. You can specifiy the digest post interval from administration panel.

The Flickr Digest Plugin features –

*   Customizable digest interval *   Uses the Flickr API *   Caption for the first photo (medium size) *   Neat CSS design for displaying other photos (thumnail size) *   Customizable diget post title,tags,category

I hope that you will enjoy the usability of this plugin, if you do , please rate this plugin.
sections.installation: 1.Upload the folder flickr-digest to your wp-content/plugins/ folder 2.Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress 3.You will have to get your Flickr Photostream URL.See FAQ to know how to get it
sections.faq:
How to get the Photostream URL ?

Go to http://flickr-digest.kapeel.info/get-my-photostream-url/ to get it.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added – ability to edit the post category(ies),tags and title
  • Bug fix – cron issue
  • Bug fix – thumbnail display

1.0.1

  • Bug fix regarding cron issue

1.0.0

  • Initial release
